Risky health behaviours and sedentary lifestyles are at the core of the musculoskeletal health challenge. 

Poor movement patterns often lead to injuries and joint stress. Correcting these issues early can significantly reduce the risk of chronic pain.

Risky health behaviours and sedentary lifestyles are at the core of the musculoskeletal health challenge. 

Poor movement patterns often lead to injuries and joint stress. Correcting these issues early can significantly reduce the risk of chronic pain.
